alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Panola (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 5:33PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central De Soto and southwestern Caddo Parishes, southeastern Harrison and northern Panola Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 533 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Beckville, or 12 miles north of Carthage, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Greenwood, Waskom, Stonewall, Beckville, Deberry, Elysian Fields, Jonesville, Keithville, Spring Ridge, Cross Lake and Darco. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and northeastern Texas.
